column1: ####    README file for General genome features    ####
**BUSCO - Benchmarking sets of Universal Single-Copy Orthologs.**
#For running BUSCO, use the following line
#-i INPUT, each proteome should be provided as a seperate file
#-o OUTPUT, saved in .txt extension; busco output files for each species are located in their own directories
#-l LINEAGE, for specifying the BUSCO lineage data to be used
#-m MODE, for specifying mode of analysis
#-c number of CPUs to be used
